creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by William Perreault
description: tri-cornered low table with rounded corners; three spindly legs that extend outward; darker, circular wood fill on surface where legs attach; fill is bisected by linear darker wood inlay; contoured edges
markings: underside of table, near leg, in pencil: [3]; underside of table, near leg, red oil pencil, slash
title: Wohl Table
